snippet: Kei Nishikori of Japan beat Ivo Karlovic of Croatia, 6-4, 7-6 (0), to win the United States National Indoor Tennis Championships in Memphis.
abstract: Kei Nishikori defeats Ivo Karlovic to win United States National Indoor Tennis Championships; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Kei Nishikori of Japan beat Ivo Karlovic of Croatia, 6-4, 7-6 (0), to win the United States National Indoor Tennis Championships in Memphis.
